products.name: Classic Cheeseburger
products.description: Juicy beef patty topped with melted cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, and pickles.

products.name: BBQ Bacon Burger
products.description: Grilled beef patty with crispy bacon, cheddar cheese, BBQ sauce, lettuce, and onion rings.

products.name: Mushroom Swiss Burger
products.description: Beef patty topped with sautéed mushrooms, Swiss cheese, lettuce, and garlic aioli.

products.name: Veggie Burger
products.description: Plant-based patty with lettuce, tomato, red onion, avocado, and vegan mayo.

products.name: Double Bacon Cheeseburger
products.description: Two beef patties layered with crispy bacon, American cheese, lettuce, and special sauce.

products.name: Spicy Jalapeño Burger
products.description: Beef patty with pepper jack cheese, jalapeños, chipotle mayo, lettuce, and tomato.

products.name: Turkey Burger
products.description: Grilled turkey patty topped with Swiss cheese, lettuce, tomato, and cranberry mayo.

products.name: Avocado Ranch Burger
products.description: Beef patty with avocado slices, ranch dressing, lettuce, tomato, and crispy onions.

products.name: Black Bean Burger
products.description: Black bean patty with pepper jack cheese, lettuce, tomato, and chipotle aioli.

products.name: Bacon Avocado Burger
products.description: Beef patty with crispy bacon, avocado slices, lettuce, tomato, and garlic aioli.

products.name: Buffalo Chicken Burger
products.description: Grilled chicken breast with buffalo sauce, blue cheese dressing, lettuce, and tomato.

products.name: Portable Mushroom Burger
products.description: Grilled portable mushroom cap with Swiss cheese, roasted red peppers, lettuce, and basil pesto.

products.name: Hawaiian Teriyaki Burger
products.description: Grilled beef patty with teriyaki glaze, grilled pineapple, Swiss cheese, lettuce, and mayo.

products.name: Fried Chicken Burger
products.description: Crispy fried chicken breast with lettuce, tomato, pickles, and honey mustard.

products.name: Caress Burger
products.description: Beef patty topped with fresh mozzarella, sliced tomatoes, basil leaves, and balsamic glaze.
